dateplot1.title: Hydrogen
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_wastewater_pilot where type=(select `id` from dateplots_descriptions where `codename`="wastewater_pilot_H2") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Helium
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_wastewater_pilot where type=(select `id` from dateplots_descriptions where `codename`="wastewater_pilot_He") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

MassSpectraOffset.title: Offset the spectra to avoid negative values

queries.default: SELECT x,y FROM xy_values_wastewater_pilot where measurement = {id} order by id
